eadid.publicid: -//us::University of Minnesota, Twin Cities::University Archives//TEXT us::MnU::uarc00199.xml::University of Minnesota Foundation papers//EN

titlestmt.titleproper: University of Minnesota Foundation papers, circa 1948-1996
titlestmt.author: Karen Spilman

profiledesc.creation: EAD encoding by Karen Spilman September 2005

did.repository: University of Minnesota Libraries. University Archives [uarc]
did.abstract: Collection contains the papers of the University of Minnesota Foundation, which is responsible for fundraising for the University.

accessrestrict.head: Use of Materials
accessrestrict.p: Items in this collection do not circulate and may be used in-house only.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: Requests for permission to quote from the University of Minnesota Foundation papers should be arranged with the University of Minnesota Archives head.

prefercite.head: Preferred citation
prefercite.p: University of Minnesota Foundation papers, University of Minnesota Archives.

acqinfo.head: Source of acquisition
acqinfo.p: The collection was originally deposited in University Archives on July 16, 1974. Additional deposits were made in 1974-1976, 1988 and 1996.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains Coordinating Council minutes and projects, Development Council minutes and projects, meeting minutes, reading files, papers of Robert J. Odegard, foundation lists, fund drive materials, and policies and a statement of purpose (1963).

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The University of Minnesota Foundation was established in 1962 by 21 alumni and friends to solicit and manage private donations for the University, including University fund drives. Its establishment was the result of the reorganization of the University's fundraising activities and the dissolution of the Greater University Fund that was established in 1947. The office is not directly tied to any specific academic area and distributes funds across the University, including graduate research, faculty support, student scholarships and loans, library acquisitions, and academic programs.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aid Available
otherfindaid.p: A finding aid with a contents list is available in University Archives.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the catalog of the University of Minnesota Libraries. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons or places should search the catalog using these headings.
controlaccess.corpname: University of Minnesota. Greater University Fund
controlaccess.subject: Fund raising -- Minnesota
